pcl_filters.hpp
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 //
2 // Original author Kristoffer Larsen. Latest change date 01.05.2016
3 // This .hpp file defines the content of pcl_filters.cpp which is a toolbox that implements the most commonly used features from PCL.
4 // In this application, pcl_filters.cpp is used for 3D point cloud processing.
5 //
6 // Created as part of the software solution for a Master's Thesis in Production Technology at NTNU Trondheim.
7 //
8
